meta.title: Golden Retriever Destructive Chewing: Causes & Solutions
meta.description: Stop your Golden Retriever from chewing furniture and shoes. Expert guide on redirecting chewing behavior and best durable toys.

h1: How to Stop a Golden Retriever From Chewing Everything
overview: Golden Retrievers are mouthy dogs by nature. Chewing is often a sign of boredom, teething (in puppies), or anxiety. Without proper outlets, they will turn to your furniture.
symptoms: Gnawing on table legs or baseboards

solutions.title: Provide Durable Chew Toys
solutions.description: Goldens are strong chewers. Use Kongs filled with frozen peanut butter or Nylabones.

solutions.title: Increase Physical Exercise
solutions.description: A tired dog is a good dog. Ensure at least 60 minutes of active play daily.

solutions.title: Crate Training
solutions.description: Prevent access to destructive items when you cannot supervise.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
